MiniHakkero.NAME: Mini-Hakkero
MiniHakkero.FLAVOR: Aka mini-EightTrigram Furnace,is originally gift by Rinosuke when Marisa left her parents.

EnhancedHakkero.NAME: Bewitched Hakkero
EnhancedHakkero.FLAVOR: Its firepower came to a new level,but is it ok to use a bewitched tool?
DESCRIPTIONS: Replace #rMini-Hakkero . NL When you play a card or attacked,gain #b1 #yCharge-up .

MagicArmor.NAME: Black Magic Shield
MagicArmor.FLAVOR: In fact I don't know what the hell is this,but since the Designer put it in the Plan,here it is.-programmer
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a Status or Curse,gain 5 Block .

EnhancedBroom.NAME: Magic Broom
EnhancedBroom.FLAVOR: Marisa always travels with her flying broom.
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b3 cards that cost 0 you played,draw a card.

AmplifyWand.NAME: Amplify Wand
AmplifyWand.FLAVOR: A Wand seems not often used.
DESCRIPTIONS: For every third time you activate #yAmplify effect ,Gain [B]  [B] .

RampagingMagicTools.NAME: Rampaging Magic Tool
RampagingMagicTools.FLAVOR: It's been so long since anyone last used them,who knows what could happen?
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [B] at the start of each turn. NL Apply a random debuff/buff ( #b2 #yFrail , #b2 #yWeak , #b2 #yVulerable , #b3 #yPoison , #b8 #yCharge-up )to you at the start of each combat.

ExperimentalFamiliar.NAME: Experimental Familiar
ExperimentalFamiliar.FLAVOR: A Familiar looks just like a shiny orb,not very powerful but will surely help you alot.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn,add a #ySpark  your hand. NL At the start of each combat,you can choose #b1 from #b3 random card,and it cost 0 for the turn.

BreadOfAWashokuLover.NAME: Bread Of A Washoku Lover
BreadOfAWashokuLover.FLAVOR: "Can you remember how many slices of bread you have eaten until now?""Thirteen.I prefer Japanese food."
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal 1 hp when you exhaust a #yStatus or #yCurse. NL When triggered 13 times,you gain #b13 max HP,and this relic no longer works.

SimpleLauncher.NAME: Simple Launcher
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce your #yCharge-up consumption threshold value from #b8 to #b6 .

HandmadeGrimoire.NAME: Handmade Grimoire
HandmadeGrimoire.FLAVOR: A notebook full of experiment records and magic material recipes;just how Marisa develops her Magics.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle,for every 15 cards in your master deck,gain [B] and draw a card.

ShroomBag.NAME: Shroom Bag
ShroomBag.FLAVOR: All witches have abnormal ethusiasm for mushrooms... NL Or it's just Marisa...?
DESCRIPTIONS: Add 2 #yParasite to your deck on pick up.You can now play #yParasite to exhaust it and heal #b3 HP.

Cape.NAME: Cape
Cape.FLAVOR: Marisa always takes whatever she wants,and this cape will surely help her doing so.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a shop room,earn some random combat rewards.
use(s) left. NL You can take the first merchandise in a shop for free.

SproutingBranch.NAME: Sprouting Branch
SproutingBranch.FLAVOR: The dead branch just come to life in Marisa's hand,how poetic.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the Start of each battle,grant you #b5 stack #yRegen .

AmpWand.NAME: Amplify Wand
AmpWand.FLAVOR: A Wand seems not often used.
